name: Peryton
languages: understands Common and Elvish but can't speak

abilities.name: Dive Attack.
abilities.description: If the peryton is flying and dives at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 (2d8) damage to the target.

abilities.name: Flyby.
abilities.description: The peryton doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell.
abilities.description: The peryton has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.
